metadata.title: CVE-2024-46748 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cachefiles: Set the max subreq size for cache writes to MAX_RW_COUNTSet the maximum size of a subrequest that writes to cachefiles to beMAX_RW_COUNT so that we don't overrun the maximum write we can make to thebacking filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
